assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: RB is consultant of FerrerInCode. Gendiag.exe SL provided support in the form of salaries for authors Dr. CF-C and Dr. PÁ, but did not have any additional role in the study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript. The remaining authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.
